# Deeper Understanding

In this unit we will deepen your understanding of the regression model. You will learn about using multiple regression model to describe and infer about the relationship between a quantitative outcome and multiple predictor variables. You will also learn about statistical control. Finally you will learn about the distributional assumption that underlie the regression model.
